name: Tilted Pixel
tag_list: web-development, web-design, website-development, website-design, online-marketing, ppc-management, adwords-management
overview:
Tilted Pixel provides complete website development and design services in the Kitchener-Waterloo region of Ontario.

The company focuses on designing websites that sell products, provide lead generation, or otherwise have measurable goals established for them. The Tilted Pixel model involves establishing the visitor goal to be achieved, then building a website solution around achieving it through a website presence utilizing proprietary technology such as the Tilted Pixel Platform as well as well-known web technologies such as Google Analytics and blogs.

The company’s flagship product is the Tilted Pixel Platform, a website development framework that all of its websites are built on. All Tilted Pixel websites are built on this framework. The core Tilted Pixel Platform offering provides features to the customer such as user management and content editing. Addons can be purchased to provide services such as e-Commerce. All components are kept up-to-date automatically, with all clients receiving the latest updates to the Platform as soon as they are available. This allows Tilted Pixel to provide the latest features and bug fixes to all of its customers.
